posts.post_content:
Back when I saw this card's name and that it transformed, but didn't actually know what it was, I thought it could've been one of two things:  
  
1: A demonic blade that "binds" you to it, eventually doing something demonic and game changing.  
  
2: A holy blade of the Avacynian church that transforms into an aura that acts like an [Arrest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arrest) and back again. That would also tie in with the motto of the church of Avacyn: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound."  
  
Still, this card is awesome.
posts.html:

Still, this card is awesome.

posts.post_content:
Story bits: Withengar was a powerful demon bound inside this blade. [Geist of Saint Traft](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geist of Saint Traft) (when he was still alive and not a ghost) was a mighty cathar who was tricked by demonic cultist to slay one of them with this blade, releasing the demon, who then proceeded to slay Traft himself.  
This story is in one of Matt Cavotta's articles, I'll look for it then post the link here.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Are people here really saying the high CMC will keep this from competitive play? With the number of cards that decrease artifact CMC, I'd be surprised if this doesn't see some play, especially with the dirt cheap equip cost.
